entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 a.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 5:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 5 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 8.0°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
